page.title: 09LOCAL NEWSPAPERS
page.content:
IN SLEAFORD THERE ARE THREE NEWSPAPERS.THE SLEAFORD STANDARD,THE SLEAFORD ADVERTISER AND THE SLEAFORD TARGET. THE STANDARD IS SOLD ONCE A WEEK ON A FRIDAY.THE ADVERTISER COMES ONCE A MONTH AND THE TARGET COMES EVERY THURSDAY.THE TARGET AND THE ADVERTISER ARE BOTH FREE. THE STANDARD IS THE BEST OF THE THREE BUT THE OTHER TWO AREN'T BAD SEEING THAT THEY ARE FREE.EACH PAPER HAS A CLASSADS SECTION (ADVERTISEMENTS). THE NEWSPAPERS CONTAIN LOCAL NEWS AND PHOTOGRAPHS AND WHATS ON e.g.THEATRE, CINEMA AND T.V.
{BY ROBERT GIBSON (age 13)}
